name: contract
description: Extract key information from legal contracts and agreements including parties, terms, dates, obligations, and financial details
prompt: Extract contract information including contracting parties, contract type, effective dates, key terms and obligations, financial amounts, termination clauses, and governing law. Focus on legally significant elements and preserve exact contractual language.

examples.text:
SERVICE AGREEMENT

Contract No: SA-2024-0315
Effective Date: March 15, 2024
Expiration Date: March 14, 2025

PARTIES:
Client: Acme Corporation
123 Business Street
Business City, BC 12345
Tax ID: 12-3456789

Service Provider: TechConsult LLC
456 Service Avenue
Consult Town, CT 67890
Tax ID: 98-7654321

SERVICES:
Provider agrees to deliver IT consulting services including system analysis, software recommendations, and implementation support.

COMPENSATION:
Monthly Fee: $5,000
Setup Fee: $2,500 (one-time)
Total Contract Value: $62,500

TERMS:
- Payment due within 30 days of invoice
- Either party may terminate with 60 days written notice
- Confidentiality obligations survive termination
- Governing Law: State of California

SIGNATURES:
Client Representative: John Smith, CEO
Date: March 15, 2024

Provider Representative: Jane Doe, Managing Partner
Date: March 15, 2024

extractions.extraction_text: Payment due within 30 days of invoice
Either party may terminate with 60 days written notice
